summary: This document details a request for $50,000 in 'Show Money' from the FBI Headquarters to be used in an investigation involving Alfredo Rodriguez. The request is linked to Rodriguez's refusal to comply with a federal subpoena unless compensated, raising concerns about potential obstruction of justice.

persons.name: Alfredo Rodriguez
persons.context: Rodriguez is the main subject of the investigation, having been served with a federal subpoena and allegedly attempting to sell documents related to the case.

persons.name: Mark E. Roach
persons.context: Roach is mentioned as the finance contact for the wire transfer request related to the case.

persons.name: Michael J. Donohoe
persons.context: Donohoe is referenced in relation to a telephone call regarding the 'Show Money' request.

persons.name: Vincent P. Pankoke Jr.
persons.context: Pankoke is involved in the investigation and is mentioned as a contact for the finance department.

persons.name: Ann Marie Villa Fana
persons.context: Villa Fana is mentioned as having met with agents regarding the case and the subpoena served to Rodriguez.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Edwards is noted as the attorney representing Rodriguez and is involved in discussions about the subpoena.

connections.description: Edwards is representing Rodriguez in legal matters, including the federal subpoena.
Villa Fana is involved in the prosecution of Rodriguez, who is under investigation for obstruction.
Both are FBI agents involved in the investigation and communication regarding the case.

events.title: Federal Subpoena Served
events.description: Alfredo Rodriguez was served with a federal subpoena for documents related to the investigation.

events.title: Request for Show Money
events.description: The Miami FBI office requested $50,000 in 'Show Money' to facilitate the investigation involving Rodriguez.

keyFacts: Alfredo Rodriguez was served with a federal subpoena but refused to comply unless paid $50,000.
The FBI is concerned that Rodriguez may have lied during a previous interview regarding the documents.
The documents Rodriguez possesses may contain evidence against an individual suspected of soliciting minors for sex.
The Miami FBI office plans to introduce an undercover agent to meet with Rodriguez regarding the documents.
Rodriguez is expected to be arrested for obstruction of justice after producing the documents.
